languages.text: "Ух... от парня несет хуже, чем от {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g}, ферментированного в отработанном {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометии{/g}. Готова поспорить, на вкус еще хуже".
"Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."
languages.original_text: "Ух... от парня несет хуже, чем от {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}грокса{/g}, ферментированного в отработанном {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометии{/g}. Готова поспорить, на вкус еще хуже".

traits.locale_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a grox fermented in spent promethium. I bet he tastes even worse than that."

"Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

languages.text: “哎哟……这家伙的味道，比泡在{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}废料里的{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}还冲。我敢说他的味道尝起来比闻起来还要恶心。”
languages.original_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

traits.locale_text: “哎哟……这家伙的味道，比泡在{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}废料里的{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}还冲。我敢说他的味道尝起来比闻起来还要恶心。”

languages.text: «Uf... este tipo apesta más que un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermentado en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} gastado. Y seguro que sabe aún peor».
languages.original_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

traits.locale_text: «Uf... este tipo apesta más que un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermentado en {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} gastado. Y seguro que sabe aún peor».

languages.text: 「ふう…この人、使用済み{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}で発酵させた{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}よりひどく臭い。味も蜥蜴牛よりひどそう」
languages.original_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

traits.locale_text: 「ふう…この人、使用済み{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}で発酵させた{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}よりひどく臭い。味も蜥蜴牛よりひどそう」

languages.text: "Puh ... der Kerl stinkt schlimmer als ein {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}, der in verbrauchtem {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} fermentiert wurde. Und er schmeckt bestimmt sogar noch schlechter."
languages.original_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

traits.locale_text: "Puh ... der Kerl stinkt schlimmer als ein {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}, der in verbrauchtem {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} fermentiert wurde. Und er schmeckt bestimmt sogar noch schlechter."

languages.text: « Pfiou... ce type empeste davantage qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermenté dans du {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} périmé. Et je vous parie que son goût est pire encore. »
languages.original_text: "Phew... this guy smells worse than a {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} fermented in spent {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g}. I bet he tastes even worse."

languages.text: "Üfff... Bu herif, harcanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyumda{/g} mayalanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grokstan{/g} daha kötü kokuyor. Tadı da alakasızdır kesin."

traits.locale_text: "Üfff... Bu herif, harcanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g}da mayalanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g}tan daha kötü kokuyor. Tadı da yanaşmıyordur kesin."
